short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refresh web pages automatically. Auto-refresh and page monitor with specified time intervals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Page Auto Refresher is a simple and easy web page refresher.
It lets you concentrate on other tasks. Upgrade your business performance!
